title: Border, late 18th–early 19th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Borders show floral and foliated spray running in serpentine arrangement, interspersed boy bow-knots. Fond: réseau ordinaire. Modes: petit réseau, enchainettes, cordonnet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-74-b.
